title: A Few Minute Adjustment
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Randy Schroeder
itunes:summary:
It can be frustrating when it feels like you're the one doing all of the work in your marriage. How do you get unstuck from those scenarios? John, Greg and Erin share how simple adjustments can make the biggest differences in the relationship with your spouse. Featuring Dr. Randy Schroeder.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Simple Habits for Marital Happiness" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-07-05?recd=1487703


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcasst/a-few-minute-adjustment/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1460508


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
